short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap candidate names with your own.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make surfing the web in the election silly season fun again!  As you surf the web this extension will replace the names of the presidential candidates with a word or phrase of your own choosing.
